varlistentry.listitem: M x N intensity images, resulting from convolution with gradient masks in two orthogonal directions
Intensity image. Each pixel has the getangle of the approximated gradient, in radians. Where DeltaX is zero, theta is taken as PI/2.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: The function getangle obtains the gradient direction theta from images yielded from convolution with gradient masks in direction x and y (DeltaX and DeltaY, respectively).
